sentences.en: Enough of vegetarianism ; let's have a meaty meal.
sentences.cn: 素食已经吃够了; 我们吃荤菜 吧.

sentences.en: Feeding a raw diet high in raw meaty bones is adding extra calcium to the diet.
sentences.cn: 喂食生肉骨也能额外增加钙含量.

sentences.en: Food rations are vegetarian , but you can't eat meaty corpses without a ( small ) penalty.
sentences.cn: 食物必须要是素食,吃肉的话你会遭受 ( 轻微 ) 惩罚.

sentences.en: Food rations are vegetarian , but you can't eat meaty corpses without a ( small ) penalty.
sentences.cn: 食物必须要是素食,吃肉的话你会遭受 ( 微 ) 罚.

sentences.en: He looked up and down the corridor, meaty hands resting on his thighs.
sentences.cn: 他两只胖乎乎的手搁在大腿上，上下打量着这个走廊。

sentences.en: He was a large and meaty fellow.
It has a jaw that is hinged at the cranium and has bony, meaty, jointed fins.
sentences.cn: 它的下颚直接铰接在头骨上,还有多骨的, 有肉的 、 有接缝的鳍.

sentences.en: It was meaty scene as far as acting goes.
sentences.cn: 这是外延丰盛的考验演技的镜头.

sentences.en: Less Meat: Do you feel tired after a meaty meal?
sentences.cn: 少吃肉: 吃过一顿荤食以后你会不会感到累?

sentences.en: The Bai Chang of home town because the face is meaty little and get a name.
sentences.cn: 家乡的白肠因为面多肉少而得名.

sentences.en: The drawing paper is meaty squared off.
sentences.cn: 画图纸被整齐地划成小方格.

sentences.en: The short, meaty reports are those he likes best.
sentences.cn: 这些简短而翔实的报告是他的最爱。

sentences.en: The sweet meaty taste, thin and elusive almost as a memory, maddened him.
sentences.cn: 甜蜜蜜的肉味, 跟回忆一样隐隐约约,不可捉摸, 却引得他要发疯.

sentences.en: This example shows meaty aromas with peppery spice and black fruit aromas of attractive intensity.
sentences.cn: 本款酒带有肉味和胡椒的辛香,具有极具吸引力黑莓果香.

trans.tran_cn: 多肉的，肉厚的，<非正>内容丰富的，发人深思的
trans.tran_en: containing a lot of meat, or tasting strongly of meat
